name: Op Men's Plaid Splice Swim Short

reviews.name: Op Men's Plaid Splice Swim Short
reviews.title: good short

reviews.name: Op Men's Plaid Splice Swim Short
reviews.reviewText: My 19 year old son works with children and is in and out of the pool often. Suit is wearing well, considering he is in a chlorine pool regularly, and fits true to size. He's on the small side so a small can go either was but this one fits well. Elastic helps since kids are always pulling on him.
reviews.title: Comfy suit for teen son

reviews.name: Op Men's Plaid Splice Swim Short
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in size small for my 11 year old grandson, who wears size 12 husky. Perfect fit and a good alternative to paying more for 12 husky.
reviews.title: good fit
